channel.title: Comments on: This is the start of a journey
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Last Chance to See | First Time Flowing
item.dc:creator: Last Chance to See | First Time Flowing
item.description: [...] shiny silver VW Beetle with only 18 miles on it and we were off. Dave drove the Beetle as he drove his own BMW, which is to say at terrifying [...]
